WeddingDance.Originally a boy: Will be facing upwards: Needs boy dance sprite template.
WeddingDance.Originally a girl: Will be facing downwards: Needs girl dance sprite template.
WeddingDance.Currently a boy partner: Needs to face downwards: Set to gender girl sprite during festival.
WeddingDance.Currently a girl partner: Needs to face upwards: Set to gender boy sprite during festival.
